explanation: [0-0] A girl with long purple hair stands in the center of the frame. She wears a black and white checkered jacket with a red plaid shirt underneath. Holding a phone in her hand, she smiles while looking ahead. The background features blue railings.

[0-2] Suddenly, another girl pops her head in from the right side of the frame. Her mouth is wide open, tongue out, and eyes wide with a comical expression. She steps in front of the purple-haired girl. This girl has a healthy tan, wears a blue denim jacket and large silver earrings. Her nails are painted with white polish. Holding her phone high in her right hand, she shows a picture of a boy on the screen. With her left hand making an "OK" gesture, she turns and exits the frame to the right with a surprised expression.
